content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James, I am glad to have the opportunity to discuss the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will take good care of the apartment. I am also looking for a long-term lease agreement.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your interest in the apartment, James. However, as a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking of a rental price of €500 per month. Is this something that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your point of view, but I am looking for a lower rental price. Can you consider a rental price of €450 per month?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I apologize, but I am unable to accept that rental price. The apartment is in a prime location and the rental market in this city is quite competitive. I believe that I can get a higher rental price than €450 per month, which would also ensure that I am maximizing my gains as a landlord. However, I am open to discussing further and finding a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you be willing to discuss a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
